name: Smashy Drive
description:
Let yourself to release the desire of racing by instinct!

Avoid the police close behind!
The more you disturb the order and become notorious, the more famous you could be.

Remember to escape from the way as long as you can.

**Characteristics of Smashy Drive
- 56 kinds of distinctive cars and skills.
- arcade actions with acrobatics, stunt and skills.
- compete with players from all over the world and see the rankings in the leaderboard.

----------------------------------------------------------------
You can check the latest news for Smashy Drive on Facebook.
- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/DreamplayIndieZone/
